fixes.name: Median Sales Price % Increase
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR medPrice = MEDIAN('trulia_dataset_cleaned (trulia_dataset_cleanedTBL)'[Price])
VAR medLast = MEDIAN('trulia_dataset_cleaned (trulia_dataset_cleanedTBL)'[Last Sold For])
RETURN ((medPrice - medLast) / medLast) * 100
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau MEDIAN aggregations to DAX MEDIAN for each column and formatted column references to 'TableName'[Column]. Used VARs for clarity and returned the same arithmetic ((MEDIAN(Price)-MEDIAN(Last Sold For))/MEDIAN(Last Sold For))*100 as in Tableau.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation uses aggregate MEDIAN() functions (aggregations), therefore it must be implemented as a measure.
